title: I Heard That I’m Super Fierce - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Horror   Josei
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Fanfiction   Fearless Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Gamers   Ghosts   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Quirky Characters   Romantic Subplot   Survival Game   Unique Weapons   Unlimited Flow   Virtual Reality
author: 曲奇碎可可
description:
The horror game “Box” has been online for two months. 

She herself was not in the arena, but the arena had her legend.

Legend had it that her teammates were chased by ghosts, and she chased the ghosts until they screamed.

Legend had it that ghosts were scared when they saw her. She was the villain boss leading the villains.

Regarding these false rumors, Lin You said:? ? ? ? ?

Lin You: I’m hardcore ghost killer, I fancy anti-killing, I catch ghosts into the picture book, but I know that I am a good player

Ghosts that are counter-killed:…

New ghosts that are about to be counter-killed:…you... don’t come here!>
